name: Top Net SEO (Out of Business)
tagline: Multi language SEO, PPC and Content
description:
We specialize in building and enhancing website visibility in all search engines through search engine optimization. Some of the many SEO services we offer include audit and analysis, keyword research, content creation assistance, on-page optimization, and live SEO consulting in New York state. 

One of our main focuses is local search optimization, so customers can find a company’s website through local search terms. Top Net SEO offers software solutions to localize content and create landing pages that zero in on one location.
We also offer outstanding Pay Per Click (PPC) management services including strategy creation, implementation and audits, maintenance, and results reporting. Our goal is to make sure your brand appears in front of the right customer, in the right location, and at the right time on the perfect device. These factors all combine to result in a larger ROI (return on investment).
